Free.origin: [representatives…shall be determined by adding to the whole number of persons " U.S. Constitution art. I"]

1 a.definition: having the legal and political rights of a citizen [representatives…shall be determined by adding to the whole number of persons "art. I"]

sub_terms.b: enjoying civil and political liberty [a people]
sub_terms.c: enjoying political independence or freedom from outside domination [these united colonies are, and of right ought to be and independent States ""]
sub_terms.d: not subject to the control or domination of another

2.definition: to relieve or rid of what constrains, confines, restricts, or burdens

3.definition: relieved from or lacking a burden (as a lien or other encumbrance on title) [a buyer in ordinary course of business…takes of a security interest created by his seller ""]

4.definition: not bound, confined, or detained by force [ on bail]

sub_terms.c: not subject to restriction or official control
